body_html: @ipeirotis As you are working on this, would it make sense to also support uppercase letters? Numpy allows for uppercase letters in indices, and we use them to denote axes that have a specific semantic meaning. also, it expands the number of axes that can be specified, as they become 52 instead of just 26. Or do you think this requires another issue? I am happy to post one, but as this is already underway, it seems the two could go together.
